Tennis
lead_paragraph: Roddick, 32, who retired from tennis in 2012, spoke about living with the knowledge that he “could still be out there” and his coming assignment with the BBC at Wimbledon.
snippet: Roddick, 32, who retired from tennis in 2012, spoke about living with the knowledge that he “could still be out there” and his coming assignment with the BBC at Wimbledon.
